title: Market capitalization of leading 100 banks worldwide 2016 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in trillion Euros for 15 number of Quarters.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.
The minimum Quarter Q2 '16 has got 1.37 times less Market capitalization in trillion Euros than the maximum Quarter Q4 '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in trillion Euros for 15 number of Quarters.
The maximum Market capitalization in trillion Euros 5.6 is found at Quarter Q4 '17 and the minimum is found at Q2 '16 where Quarter is 4.1.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in trillion Euros for 15 number of Quarters.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.
The minimum Quarter Q2 '16 has got 1.37 times less Market capitalization in trillion Euros than the maximum Quarter Q4 '17.
max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '17 has the highest Market capitalization in trillion Euros and Q2 '16 has the lowest Market capitalization in trillion Euros.
The highest value at Quarter Q4 '17 is 1.37x times more than the lowest value at Q2 '16.
Quarter Q4 '17 is higher than any other Quarters with value 5.6, followed by Q1 '17, and Q1 '17. Down to Quarter Q2 '16 with the lowest value 4.1.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros has reduced over the past 15 Quarters.
Quarter Q2 '19, Q1 '19, Q2 '18, and Q4 '16 have the same Market capitalization in trillion Euros.
The Quarter Q4 '17 tends to be 1.11 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 76.0.
